author: matifalcone
title: Grow ALDEA, Grow Latin America
description: Despite having created a community to drive Cardano adoption in Latin America, massive growth and outreach is still very hard to accomplish
solution: With an aggressive comm. plan to reach out using media platforms, ALDEA will bring key players to the ecosystem and be ready for the future!
experience: ALDEA Core Team, FALCO SPO & ALDEA Community
